WorkflowInfo.Name: Delete files older than 30 days from FTP server
WorkflowInfo.Description: Delete files older than 30 days from ftp server
WorkflowInfo.Xoml: <SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:StartFTPSession;Assembly=StartFTPSession, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns1="clr-namespace:FTPListFolder;Assembly=FTPListFolder, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns2="clr-namespace:ResultSetFilter;Assembly=ResultSetFilter, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns3="clr-namespace:GetRowsCount;Assembly=GetRowsCount, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns4="clr-namespace:TerminateFTPSession;Assembly=TerminateFTPSession, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns5="clr-namespace:ExitWhile;Assembly=ExitWhile, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns6="clr-namespace:GetCellValue;Assembly=GetCellValue, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns7="clr-namespace:DateDifference;Assembly=DateDifference, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns8="clr-namespace:ReturnValue;Assembly=ReturnValue, Version=1.2.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns9="clr-namespace:FTPDeleteFile;Assembly=FTPDeleteFile, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns10="clr-namespace:Continue;Assembly=Continue, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"> <ns0:StartFTPSession Password="" HostName="LocalHost" DisplayName="Start FTP Session" IsValid="True" HostId="1" Port="21" TypeName="StartFTPSession" Description="Starts FTP Session." TimeInSeconds="0" MaxSessionTime="00:10:00" x:Name="startFTPSession1" Timeout="00:01:00" Passive="0" UserName="" SecureConnection="0" StartSession="FTP" /> <ns1:FTPListFolder SessionName="startFTPSession1" x:Name="ftpListFolder1" TimeInSeconds="0" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:01:00" HostName="{x:Null}" DisplayName="FTP List Folder" Path="/" Description="FTP list folder." HostId="0" TypeName="FTPListFolder" /> <ns2:ResultSetFilter IsValid="True" x:Name="resultSetFilter1" Timeout="00:01:00" DisplayName="ResultSet Filter" VariableName="%ftpListFolder1%" Description="Filter a Result Set" TypeName="ResultSetFilter" FilterStatement="Type = 'File'" /> <ns3:GetRowsCount IsValid="True" x:Name="getRowsCount1" ResultSet="%resultSetFilter1%" ResultSetName="resultSetFilter1" Description="Gets the amount of rows in a resultset." DisplayName="Get Rows Count" TypeName="GetRowsCount" /> <WhileActivity x:Name="whileActivity1" Condition="{x:Null}"> <SequenceActivity x:Name="sequenceActivity1"> <ns5:ExitWhile DisplayName="Exit While" x:Name="exitWhile1" Description="Exit current while activity" IsValid="True" TypeName="ExitWhile" Counter="%getRowsCount1%" /> <ns6:GetCellValue IsValid="True" x:Name="FileName" ColumnNumber="2" ResultSet="%resultSetFilter1%" RowNumber="%exitWhile1%" ResultSetName="resultSetFilter1" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /> <ns6:GetCellValue IsValid="True" x:Name="FileCreationDate" ColumnNumber="4" ResultSet="%resultSetFilter1%" RowNumber="%exitWhile1%" ResultSetName="resultSetFilter1" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /> <ns7:DateDifference IsNowSelected="1" x:Name="dateDifference1" Description="Returns the date difference between two dates." IsValid="True" FirstDate="" SecondDateFormat="M/d/yyyy h:mm:ss tt" DisplayName="Date Difference" ReturnFormat="Days" FirstDateFormat="" TypeName="DateDifference" SecondDate="%FileCreationDate%" /> <IfElseActivity x:Name="ifElseActivity1"> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity1"> <ns8:ReturnValue Value="30" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue1" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="False" UseStoredValue="False" ConditionType="=>" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=&&& => 30" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="UserDefinedValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /> <ns9:FTPDeleteFile SessionName="startFTPSession1" x:Name="ftpDeleteFile1" TimeInSeconds="0" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:01:00" HostName="{x:Null}" DisplayName="FTP Delete File" Path="%FileName%" Description="FTP delete a file." HostId="0" TypeName="FTPDeleteFile" /> </IfElseBranchActivity> <IfElseBranchActivity x:Name="ifElseBranchActivity2"> <ns8:ReturnValue Value="30" IsValid="True" x:Name="returnValue2" ConditionName="" UseBranchWhenTimeout="True" UseStoredValue="False" ConditionType="<" DisplayName="Return Value" Formula="=&&& < 30" Description="Use a returned value of a previous activity." ConditionNumber="-1" UseCustomeCondition="False" Type="UserDefinedValue" TypeName="ReturnValue" /> <ns10:Continue DisplayName="Continue" x:Name="continue1" Description="Continue the current workfow or branch" IsValid="True" TypeName="Continue" /> </IfElseBranchActivity> </IfElseActivity> </SequenceActivity> </WhileActivity> <ns4:TerminateFTPSession SessionName="startFTPSession1" x:Name="terminateFTPSession1" TimeInSeconds="0" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:01:00" HostName="{x:Null}" DisplayName="Terminate FTP Session" Description="Terminate FTP session." HostId="0" TypeName="TerminateFTPSession" /> </SequentialWorkflowActivity>
WorkflowInfo.Details: This process opens an FTP connection, and retrieves a list of all existing files in a given path. Then, it checks for each file if the creation date was over 30 days, and if it is then the file is deleted. Use this process to delete obsolete files and keep free space on your FTP server.
